mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rule (taxon_key, dataset_key, geometry, annotation, project_id, created_by, created) VALUES (#{taxonKey}, #{datasetKey}, #{geometry}, #{annotation}, #{projectId}, #{createdBy}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE rule SET deleted = now(), deleted_by = #{username} WHERE id = #{id} AND DELETED IS NULL
UPDATE rule SET deleted = now(), deleted_by = #{username} WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND DELETED IS NULL
UPDATE rule SET supported_by = ARRAY_APPEND(supported_by, #{username}::TEXT) WHERE id = #{id} AND NOT #{username} = ANY(supported_by)
UPDATE rule SET supported_by = ARRAY_REMOVE(supported_by, #{username}::TEXT) WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE rule SET contested_by = ARRAY_APPEND(contested_by, #{username}::TEXT) WHERE id = #{id} AND NOT #{username} = ANY(contested_by)
UPDATE rule SET contested_by = ARRAY_REMOVE(contested_by, #{username}::TEXT) WHERE id = #{id}
